column2: High-dividend stocks can be misleading. Here's a smart way to find stable stocks with high dividends. Watch these eight dividend payers on IBD's radar.
column4: Eight High Dividend Stocks You Can Count On

column2: The software sector has suffered a sharp pullback this year in the stock market. For the expected rebound, the most rapid sales growers may fit the bill.
column4: 24 software stocks, including Microsoft, expected to rise by double digits over the next year
